title: Phone freezes & no sound when calling (Not solved even after factory reset & in safe mode)
content:
i bought an used pixel few days ago, after 1 days of used, suddenly phone goes freeze screen & there are no sound when in calling. On the other side got the call but after take the call there are no sound. i tried -
1. Factory reset data.
2. installing new Factory image.
3. update to android q beta
4. open in safe mode.

but its keeps going on.
